Package ohos.usb

Class USBRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.usb.USBRequest

  • public class USBRequest
extends Object
    Implements bulk transfer of data and control messages between USB devices.
    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Usb#USB_MANAGER

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void abort​()
      Aborts a pending queue operation.
      void dequeue​(boolean useBufferOverflowInsteadOfIllegalArg)
      Dequeues a request to send or receive data on its endpoint.
      void free​()
      Frees all resources related to this request.
      boolean initialize​(USBDevicePipe connection, USBEndpoint ep)
      Initializes a specified endpoint for data transfer.
      boolean queue​(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Transfers data on the requested endpoint, and queues the request.

      Transfers data on the requested endpoint, and queues the request.

        public void free​()

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize​(USBDevicePipe connection,
                          USBEndpoint ep)
        Initializes a specified endpoint for data transfer.
        Parameters:
        connection - Indicates a USBDevicePipe instance.
        ep - Indicates an instance of the USBEndpoint class.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the initialization is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • queue

        public boolean queue​(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Transfers data on the requested endpoint, and queues the request.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Indicates the buffer from which data is to be transferred.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the data transfer is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • queue

        public boolean queue​(ByteBuffer buffer,
                     int length)
        Transfers data on the requested endpoint, and queues the request.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Indicates the buffer from which data is to be transferred.
        length - Indicates the length of buffer.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the data transfer is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • dequeue

        public void dequeue​(boolean useBufferOverflowInsteadOfIllegalArg)
        Dequeues a request to send or receive data on its endpoint.
        Parameters:
        useBufferOverflowInsteadOfIllegalArg - Specifies whether to replace the illegal parameter with a buffer overflow.
        Since:
        5

      • setClientData

        public void setClientData​(Object data)
        Sets client data of the USBRequst instance.
        Parameters:
        data - The client data to be set.
        Since:
        5
